name: SubscribeRedirectMessage
description: Use this in an HTML module to subscribe your page to redirect to the data.message url when the Action occurs.  Allows selection of destination by the notifier.

src.value:
<script>
var pusherSubscription = { action: "[TknParams:Action]" , moduleid: "[Module:ModuleID]" , type: "RedirectMessage" };
if (typeof pusherSubscriptions === "undefined") 
  { alert("Warning in Pusher:Subscribe: The page has not been configured with Pusher:SubscribePage");}
else
  { pusherSubscriptions.push(pusherSubscription); };
</script>
